Package: org.ysb33r.gradle.vfs.tasks

[Groovy] Class VfsCopy

        • org.ysb33r.gradle.vfs.tasks.VfsCopy

        • Provides a copy task for remote files and directories. Unless collections have been forced to resolve earlier, it will otherwise only happen at the point of task execution. This allows for lazy-evaluation of URIs to occur as late as possible in the build lifecycle.

          Authors:
          Schalk W. Cronj√©
          Since:
          1.0

            • @java.lang.Override java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object> defaultPraxis()

              Returns a default set of VFS action options (praxis) in case no task-wide set if defined for all URIs within this task.

              Returns:
              Map of options

              Copies all sources to the destination location.

            • @Input java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAllDestinationURIs()

              Returns a list of all destination URIs as strings Calling this will cause all URIs to be resolved.

              Fully resolved URIs.

            • VfsCopy into(java.lang.Object uri)

            • @java.lang.Override boolean isUpToDate()

              Checks the state of remote objects and decides whether the object can be up to date. Up to date can be considered for the following considerations

              • Source and destination filesystems all support Capability>GET_MODIFIED_DATE and all destination files are of same or newer date than their source files
                • No files on the source is missing from the destination
              Returns:
              true if the object can be considered up to date

            • VfsCopy with(VfsCopySpec... copySpecs)
